title: AUTONOMOUS DRIVING
imgText: The Eletre's LiDAR system scans 200 metres around the car in every direction, generating a sophisticated 3D map of the surroundings to detect obstacles even in low light or inclement weather.
The forward-facing telephoto camera can see up to 500 metres in front of the Eletre. The additional wide-angle lens, 4 side cameras, and rear sensor provide full 360Â° coverage.
Cutting-edge millimetre-wave radar calculates the position, speed, and direction of potential obstacles, also accounting for low-lying obstructions.
